title: My Dad Is Abusing My Kids
description:
Lindsey says her father is now treating her three children in the same emotionally abusive way he treated her as a child, and she wants to put an end to it. - Dr. Laura: "Now is your chance to show the strength your own mother could not."

Would you have the backbone to protect your children from your own father? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
